```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(here)
library(tidyverse)

tfr_plots <- readRDS(here("tfr.rds"))
```

``` {r echo=FALSE, warnings=FALSE, out.width = "80%", fig.width = 12, fig.height = 12, fig.align = "center"}

Map(function(admin1, admin2, tfr) {
  
  print(tfr)
  print(admin1)
  print(admin2)
  
}, admin1_asfr_plots, admin2_asfr_plots, tfr_plots)
```
